front.title: Annual report on the U.S. manufacturing economy

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report provides a statistical review of the U.S. manufacturing industry. There are three aspects of U.S. manufacturing that are considered: (1) how the U.S. industry compares to other countries, (2) the trends in the domestic industry, and (3) the industry trends compared to those in other countries.

seriesInfo.name: NIST advanced manufacturing series; NIST AMS
